name: india_songs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Fetch the India Songs chart information for a given date and range from the Billboard API.

date.description: The date for which the chart information is requested, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of chart positions to retrieve.
